sentence.Network_en: As covetousness is the root of all evil, so poverty is the worst of all snares.
sentence.Network_cn: 正如贪婪是万恶之源一样, 贫穷是最坏的陷阱.

sentence.Network_en: Poverty want many thing, but covetousness all.
sentence.Network_cn: 贫穷可满足;欲望却难填.

sentence.Network_en: Covetousness is the mother of ruin and mischief.
sentence.Network_cn: 贪婪带来不幸,贪婪导致毁灭.

means.word_mean: 1. an envious eagerness to possess something
3. reprehensible acquisitiveness; insatiable desire for wealth (personified as one of the deadly sins)

auth_sentence.content: Shall I tell you of their plundering, their covetousness, their abandonment of the poor, their thefts, their cheating in trade?
